Search.requestDishDescription: Can't find what you're looking for? Add it yourself! Please provide all the information you can (name, image, category, tags) and we'll review and confirm it. Your participation helps make the menu better for everyone.

Dish.uploadImageDescription: Upload an image for this dish. The image will be reviewed before being approved.
Dish.nicknameDescription: If provided, your nickname will be shown when the image is approved.

TopDishes.title: Top Dishes
TopDishes.description: Most popular dishes based on votes

Admin.nicknameDescription: This will be shown as "Image provided by [nickname]" if you upload an image

About.title: About Cantina
About.description: This is an open source project for the IPB cantina.
About.openSourceDescription: This project is open source. Everyone can submit pull requests to improve it.
About.costNoticeDescription: Please do not abuse the endpoints as I will not be able to maintain the project if costs go high.

Rules.title: Canteen Rules
Rules.rule1: On one card, you can order one dish only.
Rules.rule2: To order food, you need to login on
Rules.rule3: The dessert must be only one to be picked.
Rules.rule4: It is highly desired to have a student card with you.
Rules.rule5: You can take up to 1 bread but secretly after getting the plate, later you can get more too if you want.
Rules.rule6: You can ask for a refill for the food.

Menu.uploadImageDescription: Upload an image for this menu item. The image will be reviewed before being approved.
Menu.imageCompressionNotice: Images will be automatically compressed to reduce size (max 10MB before compression).
Menu.invalidImageType: Invalid image type. Please upload a JPEG, PNG, WebP, or HEIC image.
Menu.imageTooLarge: Image file is too large. Please use an image smaller than 10MB.
